name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael WALLER, Petitioner

judges: Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael WALLER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of June, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
